bioconda.name: bioconductor-hiccompare
bioconda.summary: HiCcompare: Joint normalization and comparative analysis of multiple Hi-C datasets

biotools.summary: It provides functions for joint normalization and difference detection in multiple Hi-C datasets. It operates on processed Hi-C data in the form of chromosome-specific chromatin interaction matrices. It accepts three-column tab-separated text files storing chromatin interaction matrices in a sparse matrix format which are available from several sources.
